description: A modern, AI-powered helpdesk application designed to streamline ticket creation, management, and resolution. It leverages AI to analyze voice calls and audio recordings, automatically extracting key issues, action points, and sentiment to assist support agents.

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS, Lucide React (Icons), Framer Motion (Animations)
tech_stack.backend_simulation: Next.js API Routes (Server Actions recommended for future)
tech_stack.database: SQLite (via Prisma or Drizzle ORM recommended)
tech_stack.ai_integration: Browser-native Speech Recognition (Web Speech API) for prototype, scalable to server-side Whisper/LLM integration.

stages.description: A ticket is initiated via one of three channels.
channels: Manual Entry: Agent types in details.
Live Call: Real-time transcription and analysis during a phone call.
Audio Upload: Agent uploads a recording of a past call.

stages.description: Raw input is processed to structure data.
actions: Extraction: Identifying Topic, Sentiment, Key Issues, Potential Causes.
Action Planning: Generating initial Action Points.

stages.description: The agent reviews the AI-generated draft and confirms creation.
actions: Review: Agent edits summary or action points.
Creation: Ticket is saved to the database with 'Open' status.

stages.description: The ticket is worked on by agents.
features: Next Action Selection: Agent marks one action point as the immediate focus.
Progress Tracking: Checking off completed action points.
Activity Logging: Automatic logs for status changes, notes, and action point updates.
Knowledge Base: AI suggests relevant articles.

stages.description: All action points are completed, and the issue is resolved.
actions: Feedback: (Optional) Sentiment analysis of final interaction.

pages.name: Dashboard
components: StatsCards (Open tickets, Avg response time, etc.)

pages.name: Ticket List
pages.description: Searchable, filterable list of all tickets.

pages.name: Ticket Details
pages.description: The main workspace for a specific ticket.

reusable_components.name: ActionPointList
reusable_components.description: Manages the list of action points. Handles checking, editing, deleting, and 'Next Action' toggling. Emits events for logging.

reusable_components.name: ActivityLog
reusable_components.description: Renders the timeline of activities. Supports different item types (call, note, log, status_change).

reusable_components.name: StatusBadge
reusable_components.description: Consistent styling for ticket statuses (Open, In Progress, Resolved).

reusable_components.name: PriorityBadge
reusable_components.description: Consistent styling for priority levels (Low, Medium, High).

reusable_components.name: SentimentIndicator
reusable_components.description: Visual representation of customer sentiment (Emoji + Color).

principles: Visual Hierarchy: Use spacing and typography to guide the eye.
Feedback: Every action (save, delete, toggle) should provide immediate visual feedback.
Accessibility: Ensure high contrast and keyboard navigability.
Responsiveness: Seamless experience across Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile.
